welcome_message_body: Welcome to Holland, United States! Get ready to be charmed by the picturesque canals, vibrant tulip fields, and rich cultural heritage. Take your time to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Goog's Pub & Grub
restaurants.description: Goog's Pub & Grub is a burger joint located in Holland.

restaurants.name: Mi Favorita
restaurants.description: Mi Favorita is a spanish restaurant located in Holland.

restaurants.name: The Biscuit
restaurants.description: The Biscuit is a breakfast spot located in Holland.

restaurants.name: Papa Romano's
restaurants.description: Papa Romano's is a pizzeria located in Holland.

restaurants.name: Southside Inn
restaurants.description: Southside Inn is a diner located in Holland.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Park Township Airport provides services for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Park Township Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Muskegon Airport serves all commercial flights and houses the airport's amenities and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Muskegon Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gerald R. Ford International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Gerald R. Ford International Airport primarily serves domestic flights for Delta and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Gerald R. Ford International Airport primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines and Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
